Champaign.UIUC College of Liberal Arts and Science: The College of Liberal Arts and Sciences (LAS) is the largest college in the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign, created in 1913 through the merger of the College of Literature and Arts and the College of Science. It has nationally ranked programs in chemistry, psychology, physics, and communications. Its main offices are in Lincoln Hall, and most of the classes that occur on the Main Quad are LAS classes.
